mapper.select: SELECT * , op.no as op_no, p.no as p_no, op.amount as op_amount FROM `order` o inner join order_product op on o.order_id = op.order_id inner join product p on op.product_no = p.no where o.user_id = #{userId} and op.no not in (select order_product_no from review);
mapper.insert: insert into review(user_id, order_product_no, product_no, content, rate) values(#{userId}, #{orderProductNo}, #{productNo}, #{content}, #{rate})
mapper.select: SELECT *, r.no as r_no, p.no as p_no FROM review r inner join product p on r.product_no = p.no where user_id = #{userId};
